alert.note: Alert for Iron; Madison; Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 20 at 1:52PM CST until February 21 at 7:36PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Missouri, including the following areas, Iron MO, Madison MO and Reynolds MO. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches with locally higher amounts are expected late Monday night and Tuesday. This rain will fall on ground that is saturated from last week`s widespread rain.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
